title: Localize all UI text to Portuguese (pt-BR)

requirements.text: Convert all user-facing UI text across the app from English to Portuguese (pt-BR), including page titles, headings, descriptions, buttons, placeholders, helper text, alerts, and empty states.

quotes: Preciso que coloque ele em portugues pt br

acceptanceCriteria: All visible UI strings throughout the app display in Portuguese (pt-BR).
Key screens are translated: Dashboard, Inventory, POS, Customers, Cash Register.
Header and navigation text are translated (e.g., the Dashboard button and top-level page headings).
No obvious English UI strings remain (excluding proper nouns/brand names if kept intentionally).

requirements.text: Translate all dynamic and validation/error messages to Portuguese (pt-BR), including confirm() prompts and inline form/payment validation errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Inventory delete confirmation prompt is in pt-BR (currently: "Are you sure you want to delete...").
Customer delete confirmation and the 'cannot delete due to purchase history' error message are in pt-BR.
POS checkout validation errors are in pt-BR (e.g., missing payment method, insufficient cash amount).
Cash-register warnings/alerts (e.g., register not open) are in pt-BR.

requirements.text: Localize payment-method labels and raffle-eligibility messaging to Portuguese (pt-BR) while preserving stored/internal values to avoid breaking existing persisted data.
acceptanceCriteria: Payment method UI displays pt-BR labels (e.g., Dinheiro, Crédito, Débito, PIX) without changing persisted sale records or internal PaymentMethod values already stored.
The raffle eligibility alert message is shown in pt-BR on both checkout and completion states.
POS checkout field labels are in pt-BR (e.g., Payment Method, Amount Paid, Change, Complete Sale).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Maintain compatibility with existing LocalStorage-persisted data (avoid changing stored enum/string values; localize via display mapping).
nonGoals: Changing the app’s data model or persistence format (except where strictly required to keep backward compatibility).
Introducing third-party localization services or external APIs.
